Naming convention¶

Technology¶

Technologies in OSeMBE are named according to the following structure:

AA

BB

CC

DD

E

F

AABBCCDDEF

Country

Commodity

Technology / connected Country

Energy level

Age

Size

–>

Technology name

The different codes are available under Countries, Fuels/Commodities and Technologies. The energy level is either P if a primary energy commodity is the output, or F if final electricity is the output, I indicates an import technology, and X an extraction or generation technology.

Fuels¶

Commodities in OSeMBE are named according to the following structure:

AA

BB

AABB

Country

Commodity

–>

Commodity name

OSeMBE
